title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Competencies: Customized Online Programs for Training Gerontology Specialists in Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational gerontology knowledge and at least three years of practical experience in the field (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the biological and psychosocial characteristics of the elderly population to design personalized care strategies.
Learners can complete interdisciplinary social problem-solving projects related to the elderly through Problem-Based Learning (PBL).
Learners can acquire self-directed learning skills based on adult learning theory through an online platform.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
